name: Christspiracy - Private Zuzaluan Screening
description:
We are super lucky to have a private Zuzalu screening of the new documentary from the team that made What The Health, Cowspiracy and Seaspiracy. 

5:30pm to 6pm - Mingle and settle

6pm - Screening starts

7:30pm to 8:30pm Q&A and discussion with the directors (one in person and one by zoom).


There is a real possibility of running out of space, so please show up a bit early.
